original_title: Toscanini: The Television Concerts, Vol. 8: Franck, Sibelius, Debussy and Rossini
overview: The historic Toscanini television concerts with the NBC Symphony Orchestra. Broadcast #8 was of a concert on March 15, 1952, at Carnegie Hall, featuring Sibelius's En Saga, two of Debussy's Nocturnes, and Franck's Redemption.  (Concerts #8 and #9 were released on "Vol. 5" in the DVD series.)
title: Toscanini: The Television Concerts, Vol. 8: Franck, Sibelius, Debussy and Rossini
